
=head1 NAME

report

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 id (serial) - 
 short_name (character varying(45)) - 
 title (character varying(256)) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                                             Table "gcis_metadata.report"
    Column   |          Type          |                      Modifiers                      | Storage  | Description 
 ------------+------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+----------+-------------
  id         | integer                | not null default nextval('report_id_seq'::regclass) | plain    | 
  short_name | character varying(45)  |                                                     | extended | 
  title      | character varying(256) |                                                     | extended | 
 Indexes:
     "report_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (id)
 Referenced by:
     TABLE "chapter" CONSTRAINT "chapter_report_id_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES report(id)
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
